code: import axios from"axios";const favoritosAPI=axios.create({baseURL:"https://starbooks-server.onrender.com/favoritos"});async function getFavoritos(){const response=await favoritosAPI.get('/');return response.data;}async function postFavorito(id){await favoritosAPI.post("/".concat(id));}async function deleteFavorito(id){await favoritosAPI.delete("/".concat(id));}export{getFavoritos,postFavorito,deleteFavorito};
